name: @streamr-contracts/network-subgraphs
description: Subgraph definitions for the streamr contracts

scripts.docker:buildMultiArchAndPush: ./build.sh subgraph_dev2.yaml && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 . -t streamr/deploy-network-subgraphs:dev-fastchain --push && rm subgraph.yaml
